referenced facility.

immediately, please feel free to contact Deborah L. Clark, Area Manager, at (906) 228-
2852.

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CP210201090
Licensee Name: Michigan Department of Human Services
Licensee Address: 235 S. Grand Avenue
Lansing, MI 48909
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 373-3768
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Russell Sexton, Administrator
Ismael Ahmed, Designee
Name of Facility: Delta County DHS
Facility Address: 2940 College Avenue
Escanaba, MI 49829
Facility Telephone #: (906) 786-5394
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, FIA
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Delta County DHS requested and it has been approved to change the terms of their
approval to include the addition of Adoption Evaluation and Adoption Placement.
III. Methodology
Delta County DHS requested the change in terms and submitted Program
Statements and Program Policies on 10/28/2010 to this licensing consultant.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Delta County DHS submitted Program Statements and Program Policies. These
were approved and the terms of the approval were changed.
V. Recommendation
I recommend that the terms of the Approval for Delta County DHS be changed to
include Adoption Evaluation and Adoption Placement
10/28/2010
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved By:
October 28, 2010

Linda Lee for Deborah Clark Date
